help-file.title: WORMHOLE
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> & <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Approximately 30 seconds or until its limit is reached Type of spell: Generic
This spell attacks the very fabric of space and time. Given enough willpower, the caster can actually rip a hole in these barriers causing a brief passage to open to the location of their choosing. Be warned, nature tends to correct this violation fairly quickly.
